name: Marabou
run: vehicle compile -s simple-triviallyTrue.vcl -t Marabou -o simple-triviallyTrue.inputquery/ --network f:NO_FILE

name: Agda
run: vehicle compile -s simple-triviallyTrue.vcl -t Agda -o simple-triviallyTrue.agda -c proofcache.vclp --network f:NO_FILE

name: LossFunction
run: vehicle compile -s simple-triviallyTrue.vcl -t LossFunction -o simple-triviallyTrue.loss.json --network f:NO_FILE
